title: Trio Analysis using Synthetic Datasets from RD-Connect GPAP
questions: How do you import data from the EGA?
How to download files with HTSGET in Galaxy?
How do you identify causative variants?
objectives: Requesting DAC access and importing data from the EGA.
Use annotations and phenotype information to find the causative variant(s).
key_points: Downloading whole datasets with HTSGET is safe and easy with Galaxy.
Regex is a usefull tool for pre-processing VCF files.
Variant annotations allows us to strictly filter VCFs to find the causative variant.

tutorial.description:
To discover causal mutations of inherited diseases it’s common practice to do a trio
analysis. In a trio analysis DNA is sequenced of both the patient and parents. Using this
method, it’s possible to identify multiple inheritance patterns.
tutorial.title: Trio Analysis using Synthetic Datasets from RD-Connect GPAP
